StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMedicalStatusWaiversAccession]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MedicalStatusWaiverID int, @NWAID int, @SubmissionTypeID int, @DateSubmitedBUMED date.me, @DateReceivedMCRC date.me, @BUMEDDisposi.onID int, @MCRCDisposi.onID int, @DateToDistrict date.me, @UserLogin varchar(30) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_ACCESSION] WHERE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID] = @MedicalStatusWaiverID) BEGIN UPDATE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_ACCESSION] SET [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID] = @SubmissionTypeID, [DATE_SUBMITTED_BUMED] = @DateSubmitedBUMED, [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC] = @DateReceivedMCRC, [BUMED_DISPOSITION_ID] = @BUMEDDisposi.onID, [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID] = @MCRCDisposi.onID, [DATE_TO_DISTRICT] = @DateToDistrict, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = getdate() WHERE [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID] = @MedicalStatusWaiverID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_ACCESSION] ([NWA_ID], [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID], [DATE_SUBMITTED_BUMED], [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC], [BUMED_DISPOSITION_ID], [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID], [DATE_TO_DISTRICT], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWAID, @SubmissionTypeID, @DateSubmitedBUMED, @DateReceivedMCRC, @BUMEDDisposi.onID, @MCRCDisposi.onID, @DateToDistrict, @UserLogin, getdate()) END
